column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My favorite exhibit
column3: has always been the paperweights. Sounds ridiculous
column4: but check them out. I guarantee you'll want a few for your desk. Otherwise
column5: I am a huge fan of the Asian
column6: Indian and African art which dates back far in to the BCE period. Generally
column7: "normal" art (paintings from Europe and the US) bore me a bit
column8: but they do a great job here of having interesting
